# {{lb|ja|grammar|sort=しょどうし'}} inflecting [[suffix]] or [[particle]] in [[Japanese]]

====Usage notes====
The meaning of 助動詞 is different in Western grammar and in traditional Japanese grammar.
* られる in 食べ'''られる''' is analysed as an inflecting suffix in Western grammar, while it is called 助動詞 in traditional Japanese grammar.
* いる in して'''いる''' is analysed as an auxiliary verb in Western grammar, while it is called [[補助動詞]] in traditional Japanese grammar.
